Module bb.love_letter
Package bb.love_letter.networking.client

Class NetworkConnection

java.lang.Object
bb.love_letter.networking.client.NetworkConnection
public class NetworkConnection extends Object
This is a Singleton, a central storage location for the Network Connection information required by several classes on the Client Side. After the initialization it provides access to the Socket, as well as the Input- and OutputStreams so the Client can send and receive messages.
Author:
Tolga Engin

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public User getUser()
      Returns:
      The logged-in User

    • getSocket

      public Socket getSocket()
      Returns:
      The Socket of the logged-in User.

    • getInputStream

      public DataInputStream getInputStream()
      Returns:
      The InputStream of the logged-in User, all messages from the Server are received through it.

    • getOutputStream

      public DataOutputStream getOutputStream()
      Returns:
      The OutputStream of the logged-in User, all messages are sent through it to the Server.

    • init

      public void init(Socket socket, DataInputStream dataInputStream, DataOutputStream dataOutputStream, User user)
      The initialization method of this Singleton should be called only once, upon the successful login of the User.
      Parameters:
      socket - The Socket of the already logged-in User.
      dataInputStream - The InputStream of the already logged-in User
      dataOutputStream - The OutputStream of the already logged-in User.
      user - The User information of the already logged-in User.

    • reset

      public void reset()

    • getInstance

      public static NetworkConnection getInstance()
      Returns:
      The only instance of the NetworkConnection class.
